title: ExecutionLocationEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the Execution Location of a Security Agreement

oneOf.title: ExecutedInBelgium
oneOf.description: The Agreement was executed outside of Belgium

oneOf.title: ExecutedOutsideBelgium
oneOf.description: The Agreement was executed outside of Belgium

oneOf.title: OtherLocation
oneOf.description: An alternative approach is described in the document as follows.
